activities: Kivu Consulting provides investigative, discovery and forensic solutions.  In particular, Kivu Consulting provides forensic digital analysis in data breaches and in litigation or regulatory action.  In the course of providing services, Kivu Consulting may receive electronically and physically stored information originating from the EU that is the property of clients, analyze this data, and host for secure online review certain client data relevant to Kivu Consulting’s litigation or technology services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, business contact on line, off line and manually processed
recoursemech: Customers may contact Kivu Consulting directly with privacy complaints or disputes at privacy@kivuconsulting.com, or contact American Arbitration Association (AAA).
